revised_title: Chemical Analysis and Synthesis of Phenylmercaptan and Phenylene Sulfide
tldr: The author investigates the products of the destructive distillation of sulfobenzolates, focusing on the synthesis and properties of phenylmercaptan and phenylene sulfide. The study includes the analysis of their chemical reactions and the synthesis of new compounds, such as phenylhyposulfurous acid and sulfobromide of phenylene.
